info.title: Torn API
info.description:
* The development of Torn's API v2 is still ongoing.
 * If selections remain unaltered, they will default to the API v1 version.
 * Unlike API v1, API v2 accepts both selections and IDs as path and query parameters.
 * If any discrepancies or errors are found, please submit a [bug report](https://www.torn.com/forums.php#/p=forums&f=19&b=0&a=0) on the Torn Forums.

get.description: Requires limited access key.

Requires limited access key.
Returns up to 1,000 rows.
Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get bounties placed on a specific user
get.description: Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get your competition's event start time
get.description:
Requires minimal access key.
Only available to yourself.

Requires minimal access key.
Return the details and statistics about for a specific crime.

Requires minimal access key.

Requires limited access key.

get.summary: Get updates on your threads and posts
get.description:
Requires minimal access key.
This selection returns data visible in 'Feed' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

get.summary: Get updates on your friends' activity
get.description:
Requires minimal access key.
This selection returns data visible in 'Friends' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

Requires public access key.
Returns 20 posts per page.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns posts created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns posts created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get posts for a specific player
get.description:
Requires public access key.
Returns 20 posts per page for a specific player.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns posts created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns posts created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get updates on threads you subscribed to
get.description:
Requires minimal access key.
This selection returns data visible in 'Subscribed Threads' section on forum page. Threads are sorted in the same way as on site.

Requires public access key.
Returns 100 threads per page. The field 'new_posts' is also available, indicating the amount of unread posts with a Minimum API key (or higher).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get threads for a specific player
get.description:
Requires public access key.
Returns 100 threads per page for a specific player. When requesting data for the key owner, a field 'new_posts' is also available, indicating the amount of unread posts. Minimum API key is required for that.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get your hall of fame rankings
get.description:
Requires public access key.
When requesting selection with Limited, Full or Custom key, battle_stats selection will be populated.

get.summary: Get hall of fame rankings for a specific player
get.description:
Requires public access key.
The battle_stats selection will be populated only when requesting selection with Limited, Full or Custom key and for yourself.

get.summary: Get your item market listings for a specific item
get.description: Requires limited access key.
Requires minimal access key.

get.summary: Get your current ongoing organized crime
get.description: Requires minimal access key.

Requires public access key.
* UserPersonalStatsFull is returned only when this selection is requested with Limited, Full or Custom key access key. * UserPersonalStatsFullPublic is returned when the requested category is 'all'. * UserPersonalStatsPopular is returned when the requested category is 'popular'. Please try to use UserPersonalStatsPopular over UserPersonalStatsFullPublic wherever possible in order to reduce the server load. * Otherwise, UserPersonalStatsCategory is returned for the matched category. * It's possible to request specific stats via 'stat' parameter. In this case the response will vary depending on the stats requested. Private stats are still available only to the key owner (with Limited or higher key). * Additionally, historical stats can also be fetched via 'stat' query parameter, but 'timestamp' parameter must be provided as well. It's only possible to pass up to 10 historical stats at once (the rest is trimmed). When requesting historical stats the response will be of type UserPersonalStatsHistoric.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Stats category. Required unless requesting specific stats via 'stat' query parameter

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: Stat names (10 maximum). Used to fetch historical stat values

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Returns stats until this timestamp (converted to nearest date).

get.description:
Requires public access key.
* UserPersonalStatsFull is returned only when this selection is requested for the key owner with Limited, Full or Custom key. * UserPersonalStatsFullPublic is returned when the requested category is 'all'. * UserPersonalStatsPopular is returned when the requested category is 'popular'. Please try to use UserPersonalStatsPopular over UserPersonalStatsFullPublic wherever possible in order to reduce the server load. * Otherwise, UserPersonalStatsCategory is returned for the matched category. * It's possible to request specific stats via 'stat' parameter. In this case the response will vary depending on the stats requested. Private stats are still available only to the key owner (with Limited or higher key). * Additionally, historical stats can also be fetched via 'stat' query parameter, but 'timestamp' parameter must be provided as well. It's only possible to pass up to 10 historical stats at once (the rest is trimmed). When requesting historical stats the response will be of type UserPersonalStatsHistoric.

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: Stat names (10 maximum). Used to fetch historical stat values

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Returns stats until this timestamp (converted to nearest date).

get.description:
Requires minimal access key.
Returns a list of user races, ordered by race start timestamp.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Timestamp until when started races are returned (schedule.start)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Timestamp after when started races are returned (scheduled.start)

get.description: Requires minimal access key with faction API access permissions.
Requires limited access key with faction API access permissions.
Requires limited access key with faction API access permissions.

Requires public access key.
The 'is_enlisted' value will be populated if you have API faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as null.

Requires public access key.
The 'is_enlisted' value will be populated if you're requesting data for your faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as null.
Requires public access key.
Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get a list of your faction's completed chains
get.description: Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get a list of a faction's completed chains
get.description: Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get your faction's latest chain report
get.description:
Requires public access key.
This includes currently ongoing chains.

Requires public access key.
Chain reports for ongoing chains are available only for your own faction.

Requires public minimal access key with faction API access permissions.
It's possible to get older entries either by timestamp range (from, to) or with offset.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description:
Category of organized crimes returned. Category 'available' includes both 'recruiting' & 'planning', and category 'completed' includes both 'successful' & 'failure'
Default category is 'all'

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns crimes created after this timestamp

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns crimes created before this timestamp

get.summary: Get your faction's hall of fame rankings.
get.description: Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get a faction's hall of fame rankings.
get.description: Requires public access key.

get.summary: Get a list of your faction's members
get.description:
Requires public access key.
The 'revive_setting' value will be populated (not Unknown) if you have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as 'Unknown'.

get.summary: Get a list of a faction's members
get.description:
Requires public access key.
The 'revive_setting' value will be populated (not Unknown) if you're requesting data for your own faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as 'Unknown'.

Requires minimal access key with faction API access permissions.
It is possible to pass up to 10 categories at the time (comma separated). Categories 'attack', 'depositFunds' and 'giveFunds' are only available with 'Custom', 'Limited' or 'Full' access keys.

Requires public access key.
When category 'all' is chosen, you can use 'from', 'to' & 'sort' query parameters.
When category 'ongoing' is chosen, all currently active ranked wars are returned.
When no category is chosen, this selection will return ranked war history of your own faction (if any).

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Stats category. Required unless requesting specific stats via 'stat' query parameter

next.description: Auto-generated link to get the next set of records.

prev.description: Auto-generated link to get the prev set of records.

ForumFeedTypeEnum.description:
This represents the type of the activity. Values range from 1 to 8 where:
 *                    1 = 'X posted on a thread',
 *                    2 = 'X created a thread',
 *                    3 = 'X liked your thread',
 *                    4 = 'X disliked your thread',
 *                    5 = 'X liked your post',
 *                    6 = 'X disliked your post',
 *                    7 = 'X quoted your post'.

value.description: Advanced weapon bonus value in percentage.

is_interrupted.description: This is an experimental flag which should help determine 'assist' attacks which have not contributed to the chain. For example, attacks such as where the opponent lost to someoene else before the attacker could finish the attack. This flag might not work entirely correctly, so use with caution.

is_on_wall.description: Shows if the member is currently defending territory wall.

is_in_oc.description: Shows if the member is currently participating in an organized crime. Show false for members of other factions.

has_early_discharge.description: Shows if the member is eligible for an early discharge from the hospital.

UserLastAction.description: Details about a user's last action.

UserLife.description: Unfortunately, current life value is often shown incorrectly, and the calculation for each member is very resource heavy, so this field is deprecated and will be removed on 1st of May, 2025.

is_enlisted.description: Indicates if the faction is enlisted for ranked wars. Available only with faction AA permissions for your own faction.

until.description: The duration until when is the non-aggression pact valid.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the ranked war.
The factions involved in the raid war.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the territory war.

cooldown.description: Timestamp until when chain is on cooldown.

joined_at.description: The timestamp at which the user joined the slot.

progress.description: Current planning progress on the slot.

percentage.description: Total percentage split between all participants.

payout.description: Details about the crime payouts. This field is null if the crime has not been paid via the automatic payouts system.

item_requirement.description: Details of item required for the slot, if applicable.

is_reusable.description: Shows if the item is reusable or consumed during the crime.

is_available.description: Shows if user has the required item.

user.description: Details about the user joined the slot, if any.

created_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime was created.

initiated_at.description: Replaced by the 'planning_at' field (same value). This field will be removed in the future (1st Februrary 2025 or later).

planning_at.description: The timestamp at which the planning phase for the crime has begun.

ready_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime will be ready.

expired_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime will expire.

executed_at.description:
The timestamp at which the crime was executed.
Note: this value is null for all crimes executed before January 15th, 2025.

rewards.description: Details about the crime rewards. Available only for crimes with 'Successful' status.

FactionSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'armor', 'boosters', 'caches', 'cesium', 'contributors', 'crimeexp', 'currency', 'donations', 'drugs', 'medical', 'positions', 'reports', 'stats', 'temporary', 'upgrades', 'weapons'.

views.description: Total number of times players have opened this thread.

is_legacy.description: Indicates whether post was made using the old formatting engine which doesn't use HTML.

content.description: depending on the input 'cat' parameter, this will either return raw value (with HTML) or plain text. Legacy posts are returned as is, they can't be stripped of tags.

new_posts.description: Available only when requesting data for yourself (no id or your id) with at least 'Minimal' access type key.

id.description: This field will be removed on Monday, 3rd of March 2025.
This field will be removed on Monday, 3rd of March 2025.

MarketSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'pointsmarket'.

value.description: Value representing the chosen category. Traveltime is shown in seconds. If the chosen category is 'rank', the value is of type string. If the chosen category is 'racingskill', the value is of type float. Otherwise it is an integer.

chain.description: Maximum chain achieved by the faction. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

chain_duration.description: The duration of the chain. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

rank.description: The full rank title & division of the faction.

lister_id.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

lister_name.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

allOf.description: Id of the participant, could be null in stealthed attacks.

name.description: Name of the participant, could be null in stealthed attacks.

attacker.description: This value could be null in stealthed attacks.

item.description: This object could be null if there was no item being used in this turn or during this effect.

defender.description: This value could be null in stealthed attacks.

dual_fit.description: Whether the upgrade fits on dual weapons.

weapons.description: The weapon types this upgrade can be attached to.

details.description:
If the item 'type' is 'Armor' then TornItemArmorDetails is returned.
If the item 'type' is 'Weapon' then TornItemWeaponDetails is returned.
Otherwise, null is returned.

TornSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'bank','cards','cityshops','companies','competition','dirtybombs','education','factiontree','gyms','honors','itemdetails','itemstats','medals','organisedcrimes','pawnshop','pokertables','properties','rackets','raidreport','raids','rockpaperscissors','searchforcash','shoplifting','stats','stocks','territory','territorynames','territorywarreport','territorywars'.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the stat was last updated

PersonalStatsCrimes.description: Response for PersonalStatsCrimes depends on which crime version user is currently.

UserPersonalStatsCategory.description: Schema name corresponds to the requested category

miscellaneous.description: Miscellaneous stats for specific crime. Results differ based on the cat id.

battle_stats.description: This field is null when requesting data for other players.

start_time.description: Event start time displayed in TCT.

UserSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'ammo','bars','basic','battlestats','bazaar','cooldowns','criminalrecord','discord','display','education','equipment','events','gym','honors','icons','inventory','jobpoints','log','medals','merits','messages','missions','money','networth','newevents','newmessages','notifications','perks','profile','properties','refills','reports','skills','stocks','travel','weaponexp','workstats'.

ApiSortAsc.name: sort
ApiSortAsc.description:
Sort rows from newest to oldest
Default ordering is ascending

ApiTo.name: to
ApiTo.description: Timestamp that sets the upper limit for the data returned. Data returned will be up to and including this time

ApiFrom.name: from
ApiFrom.description: Timestamp that sets the lower limit for the data returned. Data returned will be after this time

ApiStripTagsTrue.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsTrue.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').

ApiStripTagsFalse.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsFalse.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').

ApiStripTags.name: striptags
ApiStripTags.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').

api_key.description:
Pass your API key as the value.
Example header:
Authorization: ApiKey rnavT95qnTCTAbdK
The 'ApiKey' prefix is automatically added in Swagger.
api_key.name: Authorization

tags.name: Stable
tags.description: Stable selections are not likely to undergo significant changes.

tags.name: Unstable
tags.description: Future updates may result in sudden or significant changes.
